title: Orin 388
summary: The Orin 388 is a tier 2 semi-automatic pistol that can be found in marketplaces. It can be upgraded into the Orin 399.
full_text:
Orin 388
The Orin 388 is a tier 2 semi-automatic pistol that can be found in marketplaces. It can be upgraded into the Orin 399.
